item.title: Is it a cat? Deploying a machine learning application as microservices
item.description: Introduction Link to heading This post describes how to setup a simple image classification service using tensorflow/keras and a set of golang microservices, that can be deployed on kubernetes. For showcasing this I decided to make a simple webpage which allows you to upload a picture and predicts whether the uploaded image shows a cat or not. The code can be found on gitlab Services Link to heading isit-a-cat consists of 3 golang microservices and the python code for machine learning part.
